World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 15 日星期一下午 2:52:54 120
Ukraine ground commander says his troops, now on 'active defence', can still surpriseHis demeanour is dispassionate and his message is clear: Ukraine's ground forces are focused first and foremost on defence along the eastern stretch of the 1,000-km (600-mile) front under his command. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:39:17 GMT隐私FNMNBGCK5YTYU5DLGI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-ground-commander-says-his-troops-now-active-defence-can-still-surprise-2024-01-15/Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Georgia's ruling party leader visits China in push for deeper tiesThe leader of Georgia's ruling party began a six-day visit to China on Monday, as the European Union candidate member country seeks to deepen its relations with Beijing, Georgian media reported. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:36:05 GMT KQQ7LD62MZLITIGCAGJJMBW3NQ https://www.reuters.com/world/china/georgias-ruling-party-leader-visits-china-push-deeper-ties-2024-01-15/Felix Light世界中国
UK marine monitoring: report of vessel hit by missile east of Yemen's AdenThe United Kingdom Maritime Trade Operations (UKMTO) agency has received a report that the port side of a vessel was hit from above by a missile 95 nautical miles southeast of Yemen's Aden, it said in an advisory note on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:28:08 GMT 26H3RVNSUNORX高威ZAG5AT3M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uk-marine-monitoring-report-vessel-hit-by-missile-east-yemen-aden-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中东地区
WHO appeals for $1.5 bln in funding to address health crisesThe World Health Organization (WHO) on Monday appealed for $1.5 billion in funding to respond to the health needs of millions of people caught up in dozens of humanitarian crises around the globe. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:18:34 GMT J2XP2E3I3JI2XHMPFFIKZKZNLY https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/who-appeals-15-bln-funding-address-health-crises-2024-01-15/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
U.S. visitors push Portugal's foreign tourism to record in NovemberAlmost 140,000 visitors from the United States brought the number of foreign tourists in Portugal to a record high last November, the National Statistics Institute (INE) said on Monday. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 14:01:20 GMT FCE6B6WITH5VOETPE2BM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/us-visitors-push-portugal-foreign-tourism-record-november-2024-01-15/Reuters世界欧洲
Houthis vow to keep up Red Sea attacks after US-led strikesThe chief negotiator for Yemen's Houthis said on Monday the group's stance has not changed since U.S.-led air strikes on its positions, and warned that attacks on ships headed to Israel will continue. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 13:27:12 GMT P25NPONU7ZMM5HWBYFP5FTGJGA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/houthis-vow-to-keep-up-red-sea-attacks-after-us-led-strikes-2024-01-15/Aziz Yaakoubi世界中东地区
More oil tankers shun southern Red Sea after US-led strikes in YemenAt least six more oil tankers were steering clear of the southern Red Sea on Monday, as disruptions on the vital route for energy shipping increase in the wake of U.S.-led strikes against Houthi targets in Yemen. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 13:12:09 GMT B4EG3EZEQRK4XJW6YRATDCQZYA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/more-oil-tankers-shun-southern-red-sea-after-us-led-strikes-yemen-2024-01-15/Robert Harvey, Natalie Grover, Ahmad Ghaddar世界中东地区
China, Switzerland sign declaration with view to expanding tradeChina and Switzerland signed a joint declaration on Monday agreeing to deepen their partnership after Premier Li Qiang met the Swiss President, the Swiss government said. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 13:01:05 GMT B2PTNNQIZVMQJLNG47XU7V7KOU https://www.reuters.com/world/china-switzerland-sign-declaration-with-view-expanding-trade-2024-01-15/Reuters世界
Reformist Arevalo assumes Guatemalan presidency after opposition delaysAnti-corruption crusader Bernardo Arevalo took office as Guatemala's president early on Monday after a chaotic inauguration caused by a last-minute attempt by opposition lawmakers to weaken his authority. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:35:42 GMT M5SZZ4LVN5NRRIJGCKJK5N5XCY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/reformist-arevalo-assumes-guatemalan-presidency-after-opposition-delays-2024-01-15/Reuters世界美洲
Iran: US can't call for restraint while backing Israel's war in GazaThe United States cannot call for restraint while supporting Israel's war in Gaza, Iran's foreign minister said on Monday, while calling for a diplomatic solution to the war in the enclave. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 12:22:06 GMT 4BZMSBGIJVJEZCVDIAVXBUHYLY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-cant-call-us-restraint-while-backing-israel-war-on-gaza-2024-01-15/Reuters世界中东地区
Qatar pauses Red Sea tankers after Western strikes on HouthisQatar's state energy company has suspended liquefied natural gas shipments via the Red Sea after US-led strikes against Houthi militants in Yemen, joining other firms pulling back from the crucial trade route. Mon, 15 Jan 2024 11:53:18 GMT SYPZJ6YM2BLCTKDY3C3NAQQ55M https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/qatar-pauses-red-sea-tankers-after-western-strikes-houthis-2024-01-15/Andrew Mills, Maha Dahan世界中东地区
